data.title: Get the Most Out of AP – AP Students
data.meta_description: Take steps toward success in college. Use your College Board username and password to log in to AP Classroom to access AP resources, including new AP Daily videos.
data.text:
Check Your College Board Account

If you’re taking an AP class this year, make sure you have a College Board account. You’ll need it to join your AP class section.

Join Your AP Class Section Online

Use the join code from your AP teacher to join your class section in My AP.

Start the Accommodations Request Process

If you have a disability that affects how you test, you may be eligible for accommodations on your AP Exams. Contact the SSD coordinator at your school if you will need testing accommodations.
